1:
Blessed is everyone who honors Yahweh,
\q who walks in his ways.
\q
2:
What your hands provide, you will enjoy;
\q you will be blessed and prosper.
3:
Your wife will be like a fruitful vine
\q in your house;
\q your children will be like olive plants
\q as they sit around your table.
\q
4:
Yes, indeed, the man will be blessed
\q who honors Yahweh.
\q
6:
May you live to see your children's children.
\q May peace be on Israel.
